thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Join-Cheer Software gets regulatory approval to acquire assets
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Beijing Join-Cheer Software gets regulatory approval to acquire assets | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Beijing Join-Cheer Software gets regulatory approval to acquire assets
text:
Sept 18 Beijing Join-Cheer Software Co Ltd
* Says gets securities regulator's approval to acquire assets, trading of shares to resume on Sept 21
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1LC55mV
Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
